info.name: Steemit - Ureka Blue
info.description:
This is a complete replacement theme for the social network - Steemit. Now you can use the site with a deep blue, nautical theme - while you go hunting for whales!

Here's a video demo: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GzdCtz0rs64
info.additionalInfo:
You can find me on Steemit here: https://steemit.com/@ura-soul
Upvotes, folllows, comments and Resteems are always welcome!
